results.title: Unit testing JavaScript and TypeScript - Visual Studio (Windows)
results.description: Unit testing JavaScript and TypeScript in Visual Studio You can write and run unit tests in... The supported frameworks are: Mocha (mochajs.org) Jasmine (Jasmine.github.io) Tape (github.com/substack/tape) Jest (jestjs.io) Vitest (vitest.dev) Write unit tests for a CLI-based project (.esproj) The CLI-based projects supported in Visual Studio 2022.

results.title: How to Test Azure SDK Integration in JavaScript Applications - JavaScript on Azure
results.description: This article demonstrates how to use a test framework for testing SDK integration. The frameworks used are: Jest with CommonJs Vitest with ESM Node.js Test runner with ESM Prerequisites Node.js LTS. Node.js test runner Jest Vitest The Node.js test runner is part of the Node.js installation.  ...ensure that the work done by someTestFunction meets.
